uk.uncodedstudios.uncode2d.graphics

Class AnimatedSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.uncodedstudios.uncode2d.graphics.Sprite
      • uk.uncodedstudios.uncode2d.graphics.AnimatedSprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MobileSprite

    public class AnimatedSprite
extends Sprite
    A Sprite with animations.
    Version:
    1.0 - 2013-04-13
    Author:
    Figglewatts

      AnimatedSprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tex, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle rect)
      Creates an animated sprite with a texture and a rectangle.

      • AnimatedSprite

        public AnimatedSprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tex,
              com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle rect)
        Creates an animated sprite with a texture and a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        tex - The texture of the sprite.
        rect - The rectangle of the sprite.

      • AnimatedSprite

        public AnimatedSprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tex,
              int x,
              int y)
        Creates an animated sprite with a texture and an X and Y position. The dimensions are the textures width and height by default.
        Parameters:
        tex - The texture of the sprite.
        x - The X position of the sprite.
        y - The Y position of the sprite.

      • AnimatedSprite

        public AnimatedSprite(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture tex,
              int x,
              int y,
              int w,
              int h)
        Creates an animated sprite with a texture and 4 values containing the X, Y, Width and Height.
        Parameters:
        tex - The texture of the sprite.
        x - The X position of the sprite.
        y - The Y position of the sprite.
        w - The width of the sprite.
        h - The height of the sprite.

      • addAnimation

        public void addAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                int x,
                int y,
                int w,
                int h,
                int frames,
                float frameLength)
        Adds an animation to the Hashtable.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the animation to add.
        x - The X position of the animation to add.
        y - The Y position of the animation to add.
        w - The width of the animation to add.
        frames - The amount of frames in the animation to add.
        frameLength - The amount of time each frame should be displayed for.

      • addAnimation

        public void addAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                int x,
                int y,
                int w,
                int h,
                int frames,
                float frameLength,
                java.lang.String nextAnimation)
        Adds an animation to the Hashtable.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the animation to add.
        x - The X position of the animation to add.
        y - The Y position of the animation to add.
        w - The width of the animation to add.
        frames - The amount of frames in the animation to add.
        frameLength - The amount of time each frame should be displayed for.
        nextAnimation - The name of the animation which plays after this one.

      • getAnimationByName

        public Frame2 getAnimationByName(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the Frame2 object of an animation by it's name, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the animation to get.
        Returns:
        The Frame2 value associated with the animation name key.
